title: Kill Them With Kindness
description:
The time has come to have it out with Bob Snyder (01:07:00). 'Little Jack' is already on thin ice (00:01:00). Dave Portnoy doesn't donate to his alma mater but left out one good reason why (00:07:00). Takin' A Walk with Greg Hiill and Buzz Knight (00:23:50). Phil Mickelson apologizes and decides he's taking a break (00:35:00). We need songwriters to come together with song to take down Spotify (00:52:00). Kirk is all in on Felger and Mazz + much more.


You can find every episode of this show on Apple Podcasts, Spotify or YouTube. Prime Members can listen ad-free on Amazon Music. For more, visit barstool.link/kminshow
dc:creator: Barstool Sports
